|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Celeno;CL2440; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{WiFiCert|WFA74015|11/07/2017}} *DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 {{FCC ST|03/13/2019|indexme.}}
;Interfaces *Four 10/100/1000 LAN Gigabit Ethernet ports *One USB 2.0 Type-A connector with host interface *One External 75 ohm “F” Type Connector *Two RJ-11 Voice ports
;Wi-Fi: Wave 2 Dual Band Concurrent *802.11ac 5GHz 4×4 Wave 2 *802.11n 2.4GHz 3×3 (CH7369) *802.11n 2.4GHz 2×2 (CH7469)
{{seealso|Compal Broadband Networks}}
